name: Introduction to Chemical Engineering
long_desc: We equip students with creative engineering problemsolving techniques and fundamental chemical engineering material balance skills. Lectures, laboratory experiments, and recitation sessions are designed to provide coordinated training and experience in data analysis, material property estimation for single and multiphase systems, basic process flowsheet, reactive and nonreactive mass balances, problem solving strategies and tools, and team dynamics. The course is targeted for CIT First Year students.
